title: Fur Elise (Bagatelle No. 25 in A minor)

musicalLanguage.description: One of the most instantly recognizable piano pieces ever written. The gentle, lilting A theme with its signature E-D#-E motif contrasts with more turbulent middle sections.
keyMoments: Opening A theme: the iconic E-D#-E-D#-E motif
B section: shift to relative major with running passages
C section: dramatic left-hand arpeggios in F major
styleTips: Light touch on the A theme
Bring out the melody over accompaniment
